divs: Sighting Detailswhen i got home from i felt like i was being watched i stopped and looked up looking at the stars when I noticed the first flash , i first thought it was a plane but it didnt move then maybe a satlitte or something still no movement at a few more bright flahes I could see the object seemed to be circle in shape and very high up one more flash then it disappered
